description: Joins together 2 (or more) ragged-right .1D files, for use with 3dDeconvolve -stim_times_AM2, or breaks up 1 married file into 2 (or more) single-valued files.

sep.title: Separators
sep.description: Separator(s) for marrying files. The first character is used as the separator between values 1 and 2, the second character between values 2 and 3, etc.

divorce.title: Divorce flag
divorce.description: Divorce mode: splits married file into separate files.

files.title: Input files
files.description: Input file(s) to be married or divorced.
